content:
My name is Tri Hoang. I am studying Master of Science in Economics at the University of Bonn. Currently, I am working as a Research Assistant at the MacroFinance and MacroHistory Lab, affiliated with the ECONtribute Excellence Cluster.
Download my CV

summary: This notebook contains my statistical simulations for Belloni, A., Chernozhukov, V., & Hansen, C. (2014). Inference on treatment effects after selection among high-dimensional controls. The Review of Economic Studies.
title: Post-Double Selection

summary: This notebook contains my replication for Abramitzky, R., Delavande, A., & Vasconcelos, L. (2011). Marrying up - the role of sex ratio in assortative matching. American Economic Journal - Applied Economics.
title: Assortative Matching
